A good way to keep this from updating the software and locking you out time and time again is to go into the Driver Genius directory, locate DriverGenius.cfg , right click on it, select Properties, click the Security tab, Select Edit... , Select your login account , then Select the check mark box under Allow for Full control , Click OK.

Now you can Right click on DriverGenius.cfg , click on Open , in the popup select the radio button for 'Select a program from a list of installed programs' and click OK. Now locate Notepad , uncheck the 'Always use the selected program to open this kind of file' then click OK.

You will see some text now in Notepad, locate: 

[LiveUpdate]
DatabaseVersion=DatabaseVersion
DatabaseURL=DatabaseURL
SoftwareVersion=SoftwareVersion
SoftwareURL=SoftwareURL

And then delete ONLY:
SoftwareVersion=SoftwareVersion
SoftwareURL=SoftwareURL

Click 'File' , 'Save As...' , in the 'Save as type:' box at the bottom click in and select 'All Files (*.*)' , now select DriverGenius.cfg , and click 'Save'.

Pop-up, Do you want to replace it? Click YES.

Now when you update, it completely skips updating the Software and potential fixes to our cracks. You can update the driver database without further worry. Have fun!

Guys, the serial given for the updated version does not work.  It just says restart program to apply serial and then keeps asking you for it in a loop.

BUT YOU CAN UPDATE.

Just install normally (don't copy crack or reg.key), and update when it asks you to.  Then after it updates/when it asks you for a serial just say no.

Close the program and copy the crack and reg.key to the install folder.  You will then have an updated database and be able to use the program.  I updated to 10.0.0.761.

You could probably get a few more updates out of it too, at least until they catch on.
